Posts.EditableText: One of my other alter egos - let's call him The Schmuck - involves me logging onto forums and acting like a total ass. I'll post endless amounts of offensive messages (usually littered with so many spelling mistakes as to make them all but illegible), refer to my girlfriend in insulting terms (I'm currently calling her dung beetle and letting everyone know she's my "property"), make threats I haven't a hope of carrying out (like gutting people with meat hooks), post photos that aren't me, flame moderators who try to persuade me to act like a decent human being, and, if I'm in a particularly mad mood, keep it up till I get banned. At which point, I'll re-join the forum under a different (but still obvious it's me) username and carry on as before. People will often tell me I'm acting like a fool but, damnit, that's the [i:ei872d1d]point[/i:ei872d1d]. Do they seriously think anyone would act [i:ei872d1d]that[/i:ei872d1d] dumb if they weren't doing it deliberately.
Posts.HTML: One of my other alter egos - let's call him The Schmuck - involves me logging onto forums and acting like a total ass. I'll post endless amounts of offensive messages (usually littered with so many spelling mistakes as to make them all but illegible), refer to my girlfriend in insulting terms (I'm currently calling her dung beetle and letting everyone know she's my "property"), make threats I haven't a hope of carrying out (like gutting people with meat hooks), post photos that aren't me, flame moderators who try to persuade me to act like a decent human being, and, if I'm in a particularly mad mood, keep it up till I get banned. At which point, I'll re-join the forum under a different (but still obvious it's me) username and carry on as before. People will often tell me I'm acting like a fool but, damnit, that's the point. Posts.EditableText: [quote="davidw":2628jsax]One of my other alter egos - let's call him The Schmuck - involves me logging onto forums and acting like a total ass. I'll post endless amounts of offensive messages (usually littered with so many spelling mistakes as to make them all but illegible), refer to my girlfriend in insulting terms (I'm currently calling her dung beetle and letting everyone know she's my "property"), make threats I haven't a hope of carrying out (like gutting people with meat hooks), post photos that aren't me, flame moderators who try to persuade me to act like a decent human being, and, if I'm in a particularly mad mood, keep it up till I get banned. At which point, I'll re-join the forum under a different (but still obvious it's me) username and carry on as before. People will often tell me I'm acting like a fool but, damnit, that's the [i:2628jsax]point[/i:2628jsax]. Do they seriously think anyone would act [i:2628jsax]that[/i:2628jsax] dumb if they weren't doing it deliberately.
